attributes.action: Make an award either civil or military to the town of Wooton Basset
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The residents of the town have consistently honoured our soldiers whose bodies are returned from the theatres of war. Their dignified demeanour when the hearses pass by is an inspiration to the rest of the country and a comfort to the families of the dead soldiers. They seek no reward they are motivated solely by a selfless desire to show solidarity to our boys who have offered the ultimate sacrifice.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
